name: Rubik's World
description:
Step inside the mysterious "27th part" of the Rubik’s cube and
discover an abstract world of Rubik's-themed puzzles.

Welcome to Rubik’s World- an abstract environment populated by “cubie”
which make up the game’s DNA. Taking the shape, functionality & concept
behind the famous Rubik’s Cube, the game turns & twists the rules to
transform it into a unique game experience for players of all ages.
